mapper.insert: insert into orders (order_member_id, order_item_id, order_item_quantity, delivery_address, order_date, total_price) values (#{orderMemberID}, #{orderItemId}, #{orderItemQuantity}, #{address}, #{orderDate}, #{totalPrice})
mapper.select: select orders.order_num, orders.order_member_id, orders.order_item_id, item.item_name, item.price, orders.order_item_quantity, orders.delivery_address, orders.order_date, orders.total_price from orders, item where orders.order_member_id=1 and orders.order_item_id=item.item_id
